title: Need help with old account.
body:
Can't get into the email of my old account and Microsoft refuses to help anyone now. Is there a phone-line for Riot that could help me more directly with this? Thanks. I'd really like to play today.
Summoner name: GYBE Mladic

replies.body: What kind of issues are you having? It doesn't look like that account is currently banned or anything, so it should be a-okay.

You can contact Riot directly through a support [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us). Note that tickets are not answered instantly and may take a few hours for a Riot Employee to receive, read and answer the ticket.
